title.en: Yogoto Akuma to Kiss o Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Yogoto Akuma to Kiss wo Suru

altTitles.th: จุมพิตปีศาจเจ้าเสน่ห์

description.en:
Collection of short stories:  
  
1. Yogoto Akuma to Kiss wo Suru  
It's been half a year since school started, but she still isn't able to get a boyfriend. While she was walking on the streets late at night because she had to work late, she suddenly started wishing that she had a boyfriend. And a devil appeared in front of her eyes!? The guy who jumped in front of her on his skateboard looked like he had black wings…! He had jet black pupils and hair with a handsome face. And without notice he suddenly kissed her…!?  
  
2. Kamisama ni wa Naisho  
My boyfriend is the "Angel-kun" at school who is a pastor's son. However, I've been keeping a very big secret from him: I'm a temple girl! No matter what it takes, I must not reveal that!  
  
3. Sakura ga Furu Koro  
His loved one died, and with resolve, he yet again closes his heart. His walls may be breaking when he meets a certain pushy girl…  
  
4. Love Hapu  
A judo-loving, violent girl like me will never find love… One day, I went to the fortune teller to ask for my fated one. She says her fated one will be a black-haired man. My annoying childhood friend, who is a brunette, and not to mention, popular, had always annoyed even more since then. I just want to find my black-hair lover, but he keeps getting in the way!  
  
5. Zettai Oshienai (Absolutely Not Telling)  
Sugiyama Rika is the Chief of Public Moral in her school and dislikes the school's student body President Jinguuji Kasui. She thinks he's incompetent and an expert at lying. One day a rumor broke out about a myth about love in their old school building, suddenly Rika finds herself entangled in the love myth with none other than… Jinguuji Kasui?!
